CodeList.Name: Combat Exposure Scale Test Name

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - Did you ever go on combat patrols or have other dangerous duty?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - Ever Combat Patrols or Dangerous Duty

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - Were you ever surrounded by the enemy?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - Ever Surrounded by the Enemy

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CES01-How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: CES01-How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often did you fire rounds at the enemy?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - How Often Fire Rounds at Enemy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often were you in danger of being injured or killed (i.e., being pinned down, overrun, ambushed, near miss, etc.)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - In Danger of Being Injured or Killed

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - How often did you see someone hit by incoming or outgoing rounds?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - See Someone Hit by Rounds

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CES01-Soldiers in Unit KIA, Wounded, MIA
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: CES01-Soldiers in Unit KIA, Wounded, MIA
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - What percentage of the soldiers in your unit were killed (KIA), wounded or missing in action (MIA)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - Soldiers in Unit Killed (KIA), Wounded, Missing (MIA)

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CES01-Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: CES01-Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Combat Exposure Scale - Were you ever under enemy fire?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CES - Were You Ever Under Enemy Fire
